channel.title: [HELP] How do i delete Wild! 317 Server
channel.description:
HOw do i delete the wild ? I juts want to make pkbox....
Thank you

item.title: [HELP] How do i delete Wild! 317 Server
item.dc:creator: @Sonis Sonis
item.description:
@Sonis wrote:

[quote=“tuptup13, post:3, topic:265747”]You using a delta source or one of those other ones its public boolean nonWild() {

Then add this below along with the other ones

|| (absX >= SouthwestXcoord && absX <= NortheastXcoord && absY >= SouthwestYcoord && absY <= NortheastYcoord )

Just use the command ::mypos
on the southwest corner and the northeast corner of where you want a safe zone and put the coords like i said :p[/quote]

No, K0 wants to delete the entire wildy and only have 1 pkbox.
The method: “nonWild” is for what is safe zones.
If you want to delete the entire wildy, then delete the entire if statment and replace with this:

public boolean nonWild(){ if(!(absX >= AnyEastPOS && absX <= AnyWestPOS && absY >= AnySouthPOS && absY <= AnyNorthPOS)) return true; return false; }

if you want to turn an area into a pk zone and it’s right now a safe zone, before that if statement or right after public boolean nonWild(){ add this:

if(absX >= AnyEastPOS && absX <= AnyWestPOS && absY >= AnySouthPOS && absY <= AnyNorthPOS) return false;

if you want to add a safe zone, then add what tuptup13 said…

If there is no method called nonWild, check for what Ramms said.

Read full topic
item.source: [HELP] How do i delete Wild! 317 Server

item.title: [HELP] How do i delete Wild! 317 Server
item.dc:creator: @tuptup13 tuptup13
item.description:
@tuptup13 wrote:

You using a delta source or one of those other ones its public boolean nonWild() {

Then add this below along with the other ones

|| (absX >= SouthwestXcoord && absX <= NortheastXcoord && absY >= SouthwestYcoord && absY <= NortheastYcoord )

Just use the command ::mypos
on the southwest corner and the northeast corner of where you want a safe zone and put the coords like i said
